TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: instance_nk = o_Entity_NK AND assigned_account_number = o_ACCOUNT_ID AND current_record = o_Current_Record_Flag

METADATAEXTENSION.NAME: Helper_Code_Snippet
Import_Packages_Snippet
OnEndOfData_Method_Snippet
OnInputRow_Method_Snippet
OnTransaction_Method_Snippet
METADATAEXTENSION.VALUE: // ToDo: Enter code that executes when a transaction is received by the transformation

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: '['||LTRIM(RTRIM(check_id))||']:'|| '['|| IIF(v_Monitor_Type = 'URL', 'URL', v_Monitor_Type )||']:'|| '['|| IIF((ISNULL(check_zone) or LENGTH(RTRIM(LTRIM(check_zone)))=0) AND SUBSTR(check_type, 0 ,5) = 'agent', 'AGENT', UPPER(check_zone) )||']:'|| '['||monitor_source_system_name||']'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: row_key

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(NOT ISNULL(check_url) AND UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(check_type))) = 'REMOTE.HTTP', 'URL', UPPER(SUBSTR(check_type, INSTR(check_type, '.')+1)) )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: v_Monitor_Type

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: '['||LTRIM(RTRIM(o_Entity_NK))||']:['||LTRIM(RTRIM(source_system_name))||']:['||LTRIM(RTRIM(check_id))||']:'|| '['|| IIF(v_Monitor_Type = 'URL', 'URL', v_Monitor_Type )||']:'|| '['|| IIF((ISNULL(check_zone) or LENGTH(RTRIM(LTRIM(check_zone)))=0) AND SUBSTR(check_type, 0 ,5) = 'agent', 'AGENT', UPPER(check_zone) )||']:'|| '['||monitor_source_system_name||']'
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: row_key

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT Process_name, DATEADD(day,1,last_run) FROM [Stage_Two_DWMaint].[dbo].[wrk_process_run] where wrk_process_run.Process_Name in ('maas_to_poll_state_errors','new_relic_to_poll_state_errors')
